subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The decision came two days after Bud Adams, the Titans’ owner, agreed that the team needed to part with quarterback Vince Young five seasons after he ordered the drafting of Young.
snippet: The decision came two days after Bud Adams, the Titans’ owner, agreed that the team needed to part with quarterback Vince Young five seasons after he ordered the drafting of Young.
